name: Parcel (itch)
description:
Parcel is an arcade physics based game that you use rope tools in order to  deliver the parcel as fast as you can within 1 minute.

Get extra points for faster delivery times.

Will you break the high-score and prove your delivery capabilities?

Windows build available, webGL will be available in a bit

Controls:

Z - Shake

X - Time Freeze

Z- Alien Beam
